TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeySpline extends System.Windows.Freezable implements class System.IFormattable
Public Class KeySpline Inherits Freezable Implements IFormattable
public ref class KeySpline : System::Windows::Freezable, IFormattable
type KeySpline = class inherit Freezable interface IFormattable

summary.span: This class is used by a spline key frame to define animation progress.

span.span: This class is used by a spline key frame to define animation progress.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要了解如何的工作原理，最好先了解三次方贝塞尔曲线。To understand how a works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves. 一条三次方贝塞尔曲线由一个起点、一个终点和两个控制点定义。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points. 协调中的两个定义这两个控制点。The two coordinates in the defines those two control points. 贝塞尔曲线的起始点时描述关键样条，始终是 0 和终结点始终为 1，这就是原因定义仅两个控制点。When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points. 生成的曲线指定时间段; 期间内插动画的方式也就是说，曲线表示时间段中动画的目标属性的更改的速率。The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment. 若要更好地查看动画进度和贝塞尔曲线之间的关系，请参阅[密钥样条动画示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为和为 (0，0) 和 (1，1) 分别，这不起作用的动画或关键帧的进度。The default values for and are (0,0) and (1,1) respectively, which has no effect on the progress of an animation or key frame.

summary.span: The first control point used to define a Bezier curve that describes a .

span.span: The first control point used to define a Bezier curve that describes a .

value.span: 贝塞尔曲线的第一个控制点。

span.span: The Bezier curve's first control point.

value.span: 该点的 和 值都必须介于 0 和 1 之间（包括 0 和 1）。

span.span: The point's and values must each be between 0 and 1, inclusive.
The default value is (0,0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要了解如何的工作原理，最好先了解三次方贝塞尔曲线。To understand how a works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves. 一条三次方贝塞尔曲线由一个起点、一个终点和两个控制点定义。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points. 协调中的两个定义这两个控制点。The two coordinates in the defines those two control points. 贝塞尔曲线的起始点时描述关键样条，始终是 0 和终结点始终为 1，这就是原因定义仅两个控制点。When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points. 生成的曲线指定时间段; 期间内插动画的方式也就是说，曲线表示时间段中动画的目标属性的更改的速率。The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment. 若要更好地查看动画进度和贝塞尔曲线之间的关系，请参阅[密钥样条动画示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011).

span.span: The point's and values must each be between 0 and 1, inclusive.
The default value is (1,1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要了解如何的工作原理，最好先了解三次方贝塞尔曲线。To understand how a works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves. 一条三次方贝塞尔曲线由一个起点、一个终点和两个控制点定义。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points. 协调中的两个定义这两个控制点。The two coordinates in the defines those two control points. 贝塞尔曲线的起始点时描述关键样条，始终是 0 和终结点始终为 1，这就是原因定义仅两个控制点。When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points. 生成的曲线指定时间段; 期间内插动画的方式也就是说，曲线表示时间段中动画的目标属性的更改的速率。The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment. 若要更好地查看动画进度和贝塞尔曲线之间的关系，请参阅[密钥样条动画示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values. 请注意，如果这些属性包含资源引用或数据绑定失败时尝试冻结该对象，将引发。Note that if these properties contain resource references or data bindings, will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an . 调用此方法方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用在调用时重写此方法的基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的冻结的副本，请调用而不是直接调用此方法。To create a frozen copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要了解如何的工作原理，最好先了解三次方贝塞尔曲线。To understand how a works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves. 一条三次方贝塞尔曲线由一个起点、一个终点和两个控制点定义。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points. 协调中的两个定义这两个控制点。The two coordinates in the defines those two control points. 贝塞尔曲线的起始点时描述关键样条，始终是 0 和终结点始终为 1，这就是原因定义仅两个控制点。When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points. 生成的曲线指定时间段; 期间内插动画的方式也就是说，曲线表示时间段中动画的目标属性的更改的速率。The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment. 若要更好地查看动画进度和贝塞尔曲线之间的关系，请参阅[密钥样条动画示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011).
